knimeNode.name: Image Parameter Adjuster
knimeNode.shortDescription: Allows one do adjust image parameters manually, stored as flow variables.

fullDescription.intro:
Interactive node to adjust image parameters manually, which are then available as flow variables. Currently adjustable parameters are
- saturation for the normalization
- mouse position
- zoom factor
- threshold value.
To do so, execute the node and open the view while the node is executing. If you continue the node-execution from the view, the last used parameter settings are used and then available as flow variables.

views.view: View to interactive adjust image parameters
